item.title: Agile Scrum Training, Scrum Master Certification
item.description:
Agile Scrum Training, Scrum Master Certification Prep, Tests
Set yourself apart with the first and only official professional certification program for Agile Scrum Training, Scrum Master Certification Prep, Tests. ServiceNow - Certified System Administrator is for the engineers and developper to validate their Agile Scrum Training, Scrum Master Certification Prep, Tests
Practice tests are designed by experts to simulate the real exam scenario. The questions are based on the exam syllabus outlined by official documentation.

item.title: PMI-PBA certification for Business Analyst
item.description:
Are you ready to take the Microsoft PMI-PBA certification for Business Analyst Analyzing and Visualizing Data with Microsoft Power BI exam?
properly balanced based on the exam domains just like you will get in the official exam. . In addition, after taking the exam you can review your answers compared against the correct answers including comprehensive explanations of each question, links to documentation and articles, the correct and incorrect answer options

item.title: ServiceNow - Certified System Administrator
item.description:
Docker Certified Associate - Practice Exams
Set yourself apart with the first and only official professional certification program for ServiceNow - Certified System Administrator. ServiceNow - Certified System Administrator is for the engineers and developper to validate their ServiceNow - Certified System Administrator
Practice tests are designed by experts to simulate the real exam scenario. The questions are based on the exam syllabus outlined by official documentation. The questions that appear in each practice test are unique and not repeated in other practice tests.

item.title: AutoCAD Course l كورس الاوتوكاد
item.description: كورس الاوتوكاد كورس هنتعلم فيه مع بعض اهم الاسس اللي لازم تكون عارفها عن الاوتوكاد هنتعلم مع بعض اوامر الرسم المختلفة وكذالك اوامر التعديل المختلفة زي Filet , Extend , Scale , Alignment , Divide , match , hatch ,text , offset , move , rotate , mirror , Block and Explode سنتعرف على الاوامر الهامة داخل برنامج الاوتوكاد الذى لا غنى عنه فى اى تصميم او رسومات بانواعها والذى ايضاً فى حاجه له مع برامج اخرى لتوصيل الفكرة وتنفيذها بسهولة .

item.title: Corso completo di Teatro per bambini 4-6 anni
item.description: In questo corso spiegherò come poter gestire un gruppo di bambini dai 4 ai 6 anni facendo loro praticare, in modo ludico ma nello stesso tempo costruttivo e creativo, attività teatrali volte alla conoscenza di elementi fondamentali per la suddetta fascia d'età. Gli scopi di un laboratorio teatrale destinato ai più piccini sono svariati tra cui: 1. Favorire la socializzazione; 2. Superare eventuali timidezze; 3. Coordinare l'attività motoria; 4.
